documentation.text:
@title MediatorOwnableModule
 @dev Common functionality for non-upgradeable Omnibridge extension module.
@dev Throws if sender is not the Omnibridge extension.

attributes.text:
@title MediatorOwnableModule
 @dev Common functionality for non-upgradeable Omnibridge extension module.
@dev Throws if sender is not the Omnibridge extension.

devdoc.details: Common functionality for non-upgradeable Omnibridge extension module.

params._mediator: address of the deployed Omnibridge extension for which this module is deployed.
params._owner: address of the owner that is allowed to perform additional actions on the particular module.

transferOwnership(address).details: Changes the owner of this contract.

devdoc.title: MediatorOwnableModule
